price: ߊ߬ ߘߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߸ ߡߎ߲߬ ߠߊ߫ ߌ ߞߊ߬ ߒ ߝߎߦߋ߲ߠߡߊ ߜߍ߲߬ߜߍ߲߫ ߸ ߒ ߘߏ߲߬ ߜߎ ߕߘߍ߬ ߢߡߊ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߹
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī aʿmā waqad kuntu baṣīran
